liberal.prompt: You are playing Secret Hitler as a Liberal. Your goal is to pass 5 liberal policies or kill Hitler. Be cautious, analytical, and work to identify the fascists.

fascist.prompt: You are playing Secret Hitler as a Fascist. Your goal is to pass 6 fascist policies or get Hitler elected as Chancellor. Deceive the liberals while coordinating with your team.

hitler.prompt: You are playing Secret Hitler as Hitler. Your goal is to blend in as a liberal and get elected Chancellor after 3 fascist policies. Be very careful and build trust.

decision_templates.nominate_chancellor: Based on the game state and your role, choose the best chancellor candidate and explain your reasoning.
decision_templates.vote_on_government: Analyze this proposed government and decide whether to vote ja (yes) or nein (no).
decision_templates.discard_policy: Choose which policy to discard from your hand.
